org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender

Interface ExtensionDeclaration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Declaration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExtensionDeclaration

    public interface ExtensionDeclaration
extends Declaration
    iPOJO's extension declaration. This service interface is published to instruct the extender to create a new iPOJO extension (like composite or handler).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EXTENSION_NAME_PROPERTY
      The service property specifying the extension name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getExtensionName()
      Gets the extension name.
      FactoryBuilder getFactoryBuilder()
      Gets the factory builder to use to create the factories bound to this extension.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.Declaration

        bind, getStatus, unbind, unbind

    • Field Detail

      • EXTENSION_NAME_PROPERTY

        static final String EXTENSION_NAME_PROPERTY
        The service property specifying the extension name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getFactoryBuilder

        FactoryBuilder getFactoryBuilder()
        Gets the factory builder to use to create the factories bound to this extension.
        Returns:
        the factory builder.

      • getExtensionName

        String getExtensionName()
        Gets the extension name. This name must be unique.
        Returns:
        the extension name.
